programme.title: NFL Game Re-Airs
programme.desc: In a game with eight lead changes, the Browns ultimately come out victorious following a monster performance from Myles Garrett who finished the game with two sacks, two forced fumbles and blocked field goal to lead to a final score of 39-38.
